title: As Covid Disrupts a 2nd Christmas, Pope Prays for Healing and Peace
content:
1. As Covid Disrupts a 2nd Christmas, Pope Prays for Healing and Peace  The New York Times
  2. Pope Francis celebrates Christmas Eve Mass as Italy sets pandemic record of new cases  NPR
  3. Pope at Christmas night Mass: Jesus shows the way from littleness to greatness  Vatican News
  4. Pope Francis, in Christmas Message, Laments Pandemic of Loneliness  The Wall Street Journal
  5. 2021 december 24 The solemn feast of the Birth of the Lord.  Vatican News

localize.title: 2度目のクリスマスを台無しにしたCovid、教皇は癒しと平和のために祈る
科维德扰乱了第二个圣诞节，教皇为愈合与和平祈祷
科維德擾亂了第二個聖誕節，教皇爲癒合與和平祈禱
